Class CustomTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
        • CustomTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
    public class CustomTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
    Extension of default table model that enables editability of specific cells and rows.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • CustomTableModel

        public CustomTableModel​(int rows,
                        int columns)
        Constructs new isntance of Class. Almost identical to DefaultTableModel constructor except for the definition of a 2D array that stores the editability for each cell
        Parameters:
        rows - height of table
        columns - width of table
